title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 19
description: With an apocalyptic calamity looming over Kepler, the Pine Guard make their final preparations, and march to battle against a stationary, reality-twisting foe. Aubrey speaks to oblivion. Ned gets a taste of his own medicine. Duck says goodbye.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
